hero.title: Find Your Perfect Academic Journey
hero.subtitle: Discover Master"s and PhD programs worldwide with personalized recommendations and funding opportunities

search.caption: Personalized recommendations based on your profile and preferences

programs.no_saved: No saved programs yet. Start exploring from the homepage!

toast.title: Program Removed
toast.description: has been removed from your saved programs

application.no_application: No applications yet. Save some programs to start tracking your progress!

toast.title: Step Completed! ğŸ‰
toast.description: Great progress! You're one step closer to your goal

dashboard.description: Manage your application progress and review your saved programs

hero.title: About Universa
hero.description: At Universa, we believe every student should have access to world-class higher education opportunities. Our platform connects students with Master's and PhD programs that match their goals, background, and financial capabilities.

one.title: Our Mission
one.description: To democratize access to global higher education by connecting ambitious students with life-changing opportunities worldwide.

two.title: Our Values
two.description: We believe in equality, transparency, and personalized support. Every student deserves the chance to pursue their dreams.

three.title: Our Team
three.description: A diverse group of educators, technologists, and former international students who understand your journey.

story.title: Our Story
story.part_one: Universa was founded in 2023 by a group of former international students who experienced firsthand the challenges of finding and applying to the right academic programs.
story.part_two: We realized that the search and application process was complex, time-consuming, and often uncertain. So we decided to build a platform that would make this process simpler, more transparent, and more accessible.
story.part_three: Today, Universa has helped over 25,000 students worldwide find suitable academic programs and successfully navigate the admission process.

celebration.step: Great progress! You"re one step closer! ğŸ‰
